name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (RishiDoesCodes)
description:
This is my first Game.  This is a Tic Tac Toe Game. Please comment if you have any problems. If you wanna help me you can donate But it is free to download.

This is based on the classic game noughts and crosses AKA Tic Tac Toe. You have to get three in a row of you symbol. if you have got 3 in a row click on one of the winning buttons.

Controlls                                                                                                                                                                          Click On the grid when it is your turn                                                                                                              Esc If you want to pause, go to thr menu or quit the game.

Hope You Enjoy It
